benchmark_details.name: NordDRG-AI-Benchmark
benchmark_details.overview: We release NordDRG-AI-Benchmark , the first public, rule-complete test-bed for DRG reasoning. It bundles (i) machine-readable ∼20-sheet NordDRG definition tables and (ii) expert manuals and change-log templates that capture governance workflows, and exposes two suites: a 13-task Logic benchmark and a 13-task Grouper benchmark.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: Provide a durable, governance-grade yardstick for future work on trustworthy automation in hospital funding.

data.source: Definition tables and expert manuals provided by the Nordic Casemix Centre.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is measured through strict exact-match scoring on both DRG and drg_logic.id.
methodology.interpretation: A model's ability to reproduce the same grouping decision as the specification is essential for evaluation.
methodology.baseline_results: GPT-5 Thinking solves 7/13 tasks in the Grouper benchmark.
methodology.validation: The benchmark was validated through empirical tests with different LLMs.
